Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Long>
Repository interface for managing User entities.

This repository provides methods for:

  • Basic CRUD operations through JpaRepository
  • User authentication and lookup by email
  • Multi-field search across user properties
  • Paginated user retrieval and counting

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

  • Method Details

    • findByEmailIgnoreCase

      User findByEmailIgnoreCase(String email)
      Finds a user by email address (case-insensitive). Used for user authentication and lookup.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to search for
      Returns:
      the user with the specified email, or null if not found

    • findBy

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User> findBy(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all users with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information including page number, size, and sorting
      Returns:
      a page of users

    • findByEmailLikeIgnoreCaseOrFirstNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrLastNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrRoleLikeIgnoreCase

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User> findByEmailLikeIgnoreCaseOrFirstNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrLastNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrRoleLikeIgnoreCase(String emailLike, String firstNameLike, String lastNameLike, String roleLike, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds users matching the search criteria across multiple fields (case-insensitive). Searches in email, first name, last name, and role fields using LIKE matching.
      Parameters:
      emailLike - pattern to match against email field
      firstNameLike - pattern to match against first name field
      lastNameLike - pattern to match against last name field
      roleLike - pattern to match against role field
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a page of users matching any of the search criteria

    • countByEmailLikeIgnoreCaseOrFirstNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrLastNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrRoleLikeIgnoreCase

      long countByEmailLikeIgnoreCaseOrFirstNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrLastNameLikeIgnoreCaseOrRoleLikeIgnoreCase(String emailLike, String firstNameLike, String lastNameLike, String roleLike)
      Counts users matching the search criteria across multiple fields (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      emailLike - pattern to match against email field
      firstNameLike - pattern to match against first name field
      lastNameLike - pattern to match against last name field
      roleLike - pattern to match against role field
      Returns:
      the number of users matching any of the search criteria
